text: Yevgeni Yevgenyevich Khrabrostin (; born 4 October 1974) is a former Russian football player and referee. He worked as a referee in the Russian Third League in 1997. His father, also named Yevgeni Khrabrostin, played football professionally, winning the Soviet Top League in 1977 with FC Torpedo Moscow. ==References== Category:1974 births Category:Living people Category:Russian footballers Category:FC KAMAZ Naberezhnye Chelny players Category:Russian Premier League players Category:FC Asmaral Moscow players Category:Russian football referees Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Association football defenders Category:FC Lokomotiv Moscow players Category:FC Torpedo Moscow players
title: Yevgeni Khrabrostin (footballer, born 1974)
